A '''potion of Weaving''' is a potion that provides [[Weaving]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing

|Cobweb
|base = Awkward Potion
|Potion of Weaving
|showvariants=1
}}

|name = Splash Potion of Weaving
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base = Splash Potion of Weaving
|Lingering Potion of Weaving
|name = Lingering Potion of Weaving
|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Weaving'''
|foot=1
}}
